title: Filter prepared from Janus-like graphene oxide nanosheets with heterogeneous nanochannels for highly efficient dye removal
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00228H, Paper
Yingkun Song, Zejun Zhang, Hongsheng Yang, Xin Luan, Jianming Zhang, Gang Wei
A Janus graphene oxide filter with heterogeneous nanochannels exhibits a high interception rate and water flux towards dye removal.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
